Room.Name: Skies above Galgorie Pond
Room.ShortDescription: Directly below is the site of a famous battle between Galgorie and a monster.
Room.LongDescription: The monster used to feed on lone travelers, and kept well hidden. None knew of the monster's existance for a long time, but when he was was found out, Galgorie battled him for three days in the copse of trees below. The beast lived in the nearby pond.
